title: Anyone Else having the same issue?

comments.body:
today i called the PES admissions and asked them if i could still apply for the admission through  mains and the helpline  team ( woman who spoke to me on call) said yes i could. I applied through KCET long ago and have placed counselling for both. 

My question is- My rank is not yet allotted and I will be applying only for the second round of counselling. How will I be allotted ranks considering I have applied today? (the woman on the call said they will INITATE THE RANKING later) i wanted to know IF THEY PROVIDED ANY OTHER RESPONSE TO YALL. Thanks
NO ,The administration is terrible they just copy pasted the Warning box on mail too ,Did you get any other details?
nope, I will be calling them tomorrow and will let uk what she saysüôèüèª
They allowed the CRL entering portal just below this.  Upload your result there
Is you rank card live, I did that 4 days ago
Ok i think they are currently generating the Score cards ,Will see in 2-3 days
No it says rabk cards will be generated 4 days after uploading
nope, have to wait 1 more day

Nope ,Shitass college administration forwarding me the same auto-generated email  
did you upload the same pdf you got from NTA ???
